#include <iostream>
#include <vector>

using namespace std;

string s;
int k,n;

int main(){
  int t; cin >> t;
  for(int cass = 1; cass <= t; ++cass){
    cin >> s;
    cin >> k;
    n = s.size();
    int mod = 0;
    for(int i = 0; i < n; ++i){
      mod *= 10;
      mod += int(s[i]-'0');
      mod %= k;
    }
    if(mod == 0) cout << "YES\n";
    else cout << "NO\n";
  }
}
